questions.question: Which stage of Piaget’s theory is characterized by egocentrism? / पियाजे के सिद्धांत का कौन सा चरण आत्मकेन्द्रितता से चिह्नित होता है?
questions.explanation: In the preoperational stage (ages 2–7), children are egocentric and struggle to see perspectives of others.

questions.question: According to Vygotsky, learning occurs in which zone? / वायगोत्स्की के अनुसार, सीखना किस क्षेत्र में होता है?
questions.explanation: Vygotsky’s ZPD is the range where a child can perform a task with guidance but not alone.

questions.question: Who is known as the father of modern child psychology? / आधुनिक बाल मनोविज्ञान के जनक किसे कहा जाता है?
questions.explanation: Jean Piaget is considered the father of modern child psychology for his work on cognitive development.

questions.question: Erikson’s stage of 'Industry vs. Inferiority' occurs during which age range? / एरिक्सन का 'उद्योग बनाम हीनभावना' चरण किस आयु सीमा में आता है?
questions.explanation: Industry vs. Inferiority occurs during school years (6–12), where children develop a sense of competence.

questions.question: Which psychologist proposed the 'Hierarchy of Needs'? / 'आवश्यकताओं का पदानुक्रम' किस मनोवैज्ञानिक ने प्रस्तावित किया?
questions.explanation: Abraham Maslow created the hierarchy of needs model describing stages of human motivation.

questions.question: Which type of development includes changes in body size, proportions, and appearance? / किस प्रकार के विकास में शरीर के आकार, अनुपात और रूप में परिवर्तन शामिल होते हैं?
questions.explanation: Physical development refers to changes in the body, motor skills, and physical appearance.

questions.question: What does 'Scaffolding' mean in education? / शिक्षा में 'स्कैफ़ोल्डिंग' का क्या अर्थ है?
questions.explanation: Scaffolding means giving support and guidance to learners which is gradually removed as they become independent.

questions.question: Which method is best for developing problem-solving skills in children? / बच्चों में समस्या-समाधान कौशल विकसित करने के लिए कौन सी विधि सबसे अच्छी है?
questions.explanation: Discovery learning encourages students to explore, experiment, and solve problems themselves.

questions.question: In Kohlberg’s theory, which stage focuses on obeying rules to avoid punishment? / कोलबर्ग के सिद्धांत में, कौन सा चरण दंड से बचने के लिए नियमों का पालन करने पर केंद्रित होता है?
questions.explanation: In the pre-conventional stage, moral reasoning is based on avoiding punishment and gaining rewards.

questions.question: Which is a characteristic of inclusive education? / समावेशी शिक्षा की कौन सी विशेषता है?
questions.explanation: Inclusive education ensures all students, regardless of ability, get equal opportunities to learn together.

questions.question: According to Gardner’s theory, which intelligence relates to understanding oneself? / गार्डनर के सिद्धांत के अनुसार, कौन सी बुद्धिमत्ता स्वयं को समझने से संबंधित है?
questions.explanation: Intrapersonal intelligence is the ability to understand one’s own emotions, motivations, and goals.

questions.question: What is the main focus of formative assessment? / प्रारूपिक मूल्यांकन का मुख्य उद्देश्य क्या है?
questions.explanation: Formative assessment is conducted during learning to track progress and improve teaching strategies.

questions.question: Which term refers to the ability to control emotions and impulses? / किस शब्द का अर्थ भावनाओं और आवेगों को नियंत्रित करने की क्षमता है?
questions.explanation: Self-regulation is the ability to manage emotions, behaviors, and thoughts in pursuit of long-term goals.

questions.question: In Bloom’s taxonomy, 'Analysis' belongs to which domain? / ब्लूम की वर्गीकरण प्रणाली में, 'विश्लेषण' किस क्षेत्र से संबंधित है?
questions.explanation: Analysis is part of the cognitive domain which deals with mental skills and knowledge.

questions.question: What does 'Differentiated Instruction' mean? / 'भेदभावपूर्ण शिक्षण' का क्या अर्थ है?
options: Teaching all students the same way
questions.explanation: Differentiated instruction involves tailoring teaching methods to meet the diverse needs of learners.

questions.question: Which factor has the most influence on a child’s personality development? / बच्चे के व्यक्तित्व विकास पर सबसे अधिक प्रभाव किस कारक का होता है?
questions.explanation: Personality is shaped by both genetic factors and environmental influences.

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of fine motor skills? / निम्नलिखित में से कौन सा सूक्ष्म मोटर कौशल का उदाहरण है?
questions.explanation: Fine motor skills involve small muscle movements, such as those used in writing.

questions.question: Who proposed the 'Hierarchy of Needs' theory? / 'आवश्यकताओं का पदानुक्रम' सिद्धांत किसने प्रस्तावित किया?
questions.explanation: Abraham Maslow proposed a hierarchy of human needs ranging from basic needs to self-actualization.

questions.question: Which stage in Piaget’s theory is characterized by egocentrism? / पियाजे के सिद्धांत में कौन सा चरण अहंकेन्द्रितता से चिह्नित है?
questions.explanation: Children in the preoperational stage often have difficulty seeing things from others’ perspectives.

questions.question: What is the main purpose of diagnostic testing? / नैदानिक परीक्षण का मुख्य उद्देश्य क्या है?
questions.explanation: Diagnostic tests help teachers find specific learning problems in students.

questions.question: Which is an example of intrinsic motivation? / आंतरिक प्रेरणा का उदाहरण कौन सा है?
questions.explanation: Intrinsic motivation comes from internal desires such as enjoyment or personal satisfaction.

questions.question: What does the term 'Readiness' mean in learning? / सीखने में 'तैयारी' शब्द का क्या अर्थ है?
options: State of physical, mental, and emotional preparedness
questions.answer: State of physical, mental, and emotional preparedness
questions.explanation: Readiness means the learner is physically, mentally, and emotionally prepared to learn.

questions.question: Which one is NOT a principle of child development? / इनमें से कौन सा बाल विकास का सिद्धांत नहीं है?
options: All children develop at the same rate
Development is influenced by heredity and environment
questions.answer: All children develop at the same rate
questions.explanation: Children develop at different rates, though the sequence of development is similar.

questions.question: Which type of assessment is done at the end of a term? / सत्र के अंत में किस प्रकार का मूल्यांकन किया जाता है?
questions.explanation: Summative assessment evaluates student learning at the end of an instructional period.

questions.question: What is the main focus of constructivist teaching? / रचनावादी शिक्षण का मुख्य उद्देश्य क्या है?
questions.explanation: Constructivist teaching emphasizes active participation and knowledge construction by learners.

questions.question: In which stage of Erikson’s theory does the conflict 'Initiative vs. Guilt' occur? / एरिक्सन के सिद्धांत में 'पहल बनाम अपराधबोध' का संघर्ष किस चरण में होता है?
questions.explanation: This stage occurs around ages 3–6 when children assert control and power over their environment.

questions.question: Which of the following is an affective domain objective? / निम्नलिखित में से कौन सा भावात्मक क्षेत्र का उद्देश्य है?
options: To identify parts of a plant
questions.explanation: Affective domain objectives deal with feelings, attitudes, and values.

questions.question: Which law of learning states that learning is strengthened when followed by satisfaction? / सीखने का कौन सा नियम कहता है कि संतोष के बाद सीखने को मजबूती मिलती है?
questions.explanation: Thorndike’s Law of Effect states that behaviors followed by satisfaction are more likely to be repeated.

questions.question: Which is the best approach to handle slow learners? / धीमे सीखने वाले बच्चों को संभालने का सबसे अच्छा तरीका क्या है?
questions.explanation: Slow learners benefit from personalized guidance and encouragement.

questions.question: Which of the following best describes 'Metacognition'? / 'मेटाकॉग्निशन' का सबसे अच्छा वर्णन कौन सा है?
questions.explanation: Metacognition involves awareness and regulation of one’s own thinking processes.

questions.question: Which of the following is a synonym for 'Happy'? / निम्नलिखित में से 'Happy' का पर्यायवाची कौन सा है?
questions.explanation: 'Joyful' means feeling or expressing great happiness.

questions.question: Identify the correct spelling. / सही वर्तनी पहचानें।
questions.explanation: The correct spelling is 'Receive' (i before e except after c rule).

questions.question: Choose the correct article: He bought ___ apple. / सही आर्टिकल चुनें: He bought ___ apple.
questions.explanation: 'An' is used before vowel sounds like 'apple'.

questions.question: Which tense is used in: 'She is reading a book'? / 'She is reading a book' में कौन सा काल प्रयोग हुआ है?
questions.explanation: Present Continuous is used for actions happening now.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: The sun ___ in the east. / रिक्त स्थान भरें: The sun ___ in the east.
questions.explanation: The simple present 'rises' is used for universal truths.

questions.question: Choose the antonym of 'Brave'. / 'Brave' का विलोम शब्द चुनें।
questions.explanation: 'Cowardly' means lacking courage, opposite of 'Brave'.

questions.question: Identify the type of sentence: 'Please close the door.' / वाक्य का प्रकार पहचानें: 'Please close the door.'
questions.explanation: Imperative sentences give commands, requests, or instructions.

questions.question: Choose the correct preposition: He is fond ___ music. / सही पूर्वसर्ग चुनें: He is fond ___ music.
questions.explanation: The phrase is 'fond of' meaning having a liking for.

questions.question: Which word is an adjective in: 'The tall building is beautiful.' / 'The tall building is beautiful.' में कौन सा शब्द विशेषण है?
questions.explanation: 'Tall' describes the noun 'building', hence it is an adjective.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: She _____ to school every day. / रिक्त स्थान भरें: वह हर दिन स्कूल _____ जाती है।
questions.explanation: In present simple tense with 'she', use base verb + 's'.

questions.explanation: 'Environment' is the correct spelling.

questions.question: Choose the synonym of 'Happy': / 'Happy' का समानार्थी चुनें:
questions.explanation: 'Joyful' means feeling or showing happiness.

questions.question: Find the correct passive form: 'They wrote a letter.' / सही निष्क्रिय रूप पहचानें: 'They wrote a letter.'
options: A letter was written by them.
A letter is written by them.
A letter was wrote by them.
questions.answer: A letter was written by them.
questions.explanation: Past tense passive form uses 'was/were' + past participle.

questions.question: Select the correct option: He has been working here ___ 2010. / सही विकल्प चुनें: He has been working here ___ 2010.
questions.explanation: 'Since' is used with a specific starting point in time.

questions.question: Choose the correctly punctuated sentence. / सही विराम चिह्न वाला वाक्य चुनें।
questions.explanation: No comma is needed; it's a simple question.

questions.question: Which of the following is a pronoun? / निम्नलिखित में से कौन सा सर्वनाम है?
questions.explanation: 'He' is a pronoun used in place of a noun.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: There aren’t ___ oranges left. / रिक्त स्थान भरें: There aren’t ___ oranges left.
questions.explanation: 'Any' is used in negative sentences for countable nouns.

questions.question: Identify the correct comparative form: 'good'. / 'good' का सही तुलनात्मक रूप पहचानें।
questions.explanation: The irregular comparative form of 'good' is 'better'.

questions.question: Choose the correct reported speech: She said, 'I am happy.' / सही अप्रत्यक्ष वाक्य चुनें: She said, 'I am happy.'
options: She said that she is happy.
She said that she was happy.
She said that she were happy.
questions.answer: She said that she was happy.
questions.explanation: Present tense in direct speech changes to past tense in reported speech.

questions.question: Which sentence is in the future perfect tense? / कौन सा वाक्य भविष्य पूर्ण काल में है?
options: I will have finished my work by 5 PM.
questions.answer: I will have finished my work by 5 PM.
questions.explanation: Future perfect uses 'will have' + past participle.

questions.question: Choose the synonym of 'Begin'. / 'Begin' का पर्यायवाची चुनें।
questions.explanation: 'Start' has the same meaning as 'Begin'.

questions.question: Which is the correct question tag: You are a teacher, ___? / सही प्रश्न टैग चुनें: You are a teacher, ___?
questions.explanation: Positive statement takes a negative question tag.

questions.question: Identify the correct idiom meaning 'to start something': / 'किसी चीज़ की शुरुआत करना' के लिए सही मुहावरा पहचानें:
questions.explanation: 'Break the ice' means to start a conversation or activity.

questions.question: Choose the correct plural form of 'Child'. / 'Child' का सही बहुवचन चुनें।
questions.explanation: The irregular plural of 'Child' is 'Children'.

questions.question: What is the opposite of 'Hot'? / 'Hot' का विलोम क्या है?
questions.explanation: 'Cold' is the opposite of 'Hot'.

questions.question: Choose the correct homophone: The knight rode a ___ horse. / सही समोच्च शब्द चुनें: The knight rode a ___ horse.
questions.explanation: 'Bare' means uncovered; 'Knight' is a medieval soldier.

questions.question: Which sentence is in past continuous tense? / कौन सा वाक्य भूत कालीन अपूर्ण काल में है?
questions.explanation: Past continuous uses 'was/were' + verb-ing.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: She ___ to school every day. / रिक्त स्थान भरें: She ___ to school every day.
questions.explanation: Third person singular in present tense takes 'goes'.

questions.question: Which of these is a conjunction? / इनमें से कौन सा संयोजक है?
questions.explanation: 'And' connects words or clauses.

questions.question: Choose the correct sentence: / सही वाक्य चुनें:

questions.question: ‘अकथ कहानी प्रेम की’ के रचयिता कौन हैं?
questions.explanation: ‘अकथ कहानी प्रेम की’ प्रसिद्ध कवि जयशंकर प्रसाद की रचना है।

questions.explanation: ‘रश्मिरथी’ रामधारी सिंह दिनकर का प्रसिद्ध महाकाव्य है।

questions.question: ‘साकेत’ काव्य के रचयिता कौन हैं?
questions.explanation: ‘साकेत’ मैथिलीशरण गुप्त का प्रसिद्ध काव्य है।

questions.question: ‘अधूरा सच’ किसकी रचना है?
questions.explanation: ‘अधूरा सच’ प्रसिद्ध लेखक यशपाल का उपन्यास है।

questions.question: ‘निराला’ किस साहित्य विधा से जुड़े हैं?
questions.explanation: सूर्यकांत त्रिपाठी ‘निराला’ हिन्दी कविता के प्रमुख स्तंभ हैं।

questions.question: ‘पंच परमेश्वर’ किसकी कहानी है?
questions.explanation: ‘पंच परमेश्वर’ प्रेमचंद की प्रसिद्ध कहानी है।

questions.question: ‘सप्तपदी’ के लेखक कौन हैं?
questions.explanation: ‘सप्तपदी’ धर्मवीर भारती का प्रसिद्ध उपन्यास है।

questions.question: ‘गोदान’ उपन्यास में मुख्य पात्र कौन है?
questions.explanation: ‘गोदान’ का नायक होरी एक किसान है।

questions.question: ‘सुरसती का देवता’ किसकी रचना है?
questions.explanation: ‘सुरसती का देवता’ मुंशी प्रेमचंद का उपन्यास है।

questions.question: ‘विषवृक्ष’ किसकी रचना है?
questions.explanation: ‘विषवृक्ष’ बंकिमचंद्र चट्टोपाध्याय का उपन्यास है।

questions.question: ‘पाथेर पांचाली’ किसकी रचना है?
questions.explanation: ‘पाथेर पांचाली’ बिभूतिभूषण बंद्योपाध्याय का प्रसिद्ध उपन्यास है।

questions.question: ‘गुनाहों का देवता’ के लेखक कौन हैं?
questions.explanation: ‘गुनाहों का देवता’ धर्मवीर भारती का लोकप्रिय उपन्यास है।

questions.question: ‘चंद्रकांता’ किसकी रचना है?
questions.explanation: ‘चंद्रकांता’ हिन्दी के लोकप्रिय उपन्यासों में से एक है।

questions.question: ‘मेघदूत’ के रचयिता कौन हैं?
questions.explanation: ‘मेघदूत’ संस्कृत के महान कवि कालिदास की रचना है।

questions.question: ‘गीतांजलि’ का हिन्दी अनुवाद किसने किया?
questions.explanation: ‘गीतांजलि’ का हिन्दी अनुवाद महादेवी वर्मा ने किया।

questions.question: ‘संध्या गीत’ किसकी रचना है?
questions.explanation: ‘संध्या गीत’ महादेवी वर्मा की काव्य रचना है।

questions.question: ‘अनामिका’ कविता संग्रह के कवि कौन हैं?
questions.explanation: ‘अनामिका’ सूर्यकांत त्रिपाठी ‘निराला’ की रचना है।

questions.question: ‘भारत भारती’ के कवि कौन हैं?
questions.explanation: ‘भारत भारती’ मैथिलीशरण गुप्त की देशभक्ति कविता है।

questions.question: ‘मधुशाला’ किस वर्ष प्रकाशित हुई?
questions.explanation: ‘मधुशाला’ हरिवंश राय बच्चन की काव्य कृति 1935 में प्रकाशित हुई।

questions.question: ‘गीत गोविंद’ के रचयिता कौन हैं?
questions.explanation: ‘गीत गोविंद’ संस्कृत के महान कवि जयदेव की रचना है।

questions.question: ‘राम की शक्तिपूजा’ किसकी रचना है?
questions.explanation: ‘राम की शक्तिपूजा’ सूर्यकांत त्रिपाठी ‘निराला’ की प्रसिद्ध कविता है।

questions.question: ‘कामायनी’ के रचयिता कौन हैं?
questions.explanation: ‘कामायनी’ जयशंकर प्रसाद की प्रसिद्ध रचना है।

questions.question: ‘पुष्प की अभिलाषा’ कविता किसकी है?
questions.explanation: ‘पुष्प की अभिलाषा’ मैथिलीशरण गुप्त की प्रेरणादायक कविता है।

questions.question: ‘तारसप्तक’ किस विधा से सम्बंधित है?
questions.explanation: ‘तारसप्तक’ कविता संग्रह है जिसमें अनेक कवियों की रचनाएँ हैं।

questions.question: ‘निर्गुण भक्ति’ के प्रमुख कवि कौन हैं?
questions.explanation: कबीर निर्गुण भक्ति के प्रमुख कवि हैं।

questions.question: ‘रामचरितमानस’ किसकी रचना है?
questions.explanation: ‘रामचरितमानस’ तुलसीदास द्वारा रचित महाकाव्य है।

questions.question: ‘भूख’ कविता के कवि कौन हैं?
questions.explanation: ‘भूख’ सुमित्रानंदन पंत की कविता है।

questions.question: ‘अभिज्ञान शाकुंतल’ के रचयिता कौन हैं?
questions.explanation: ‘अभिज्ञान शाकुंतल’ संस्कृत नाटक कालिदास की रचना है।

questions.question: ‘कृष्ण की चेतावनी’ कविता किसकी है?
questions.explanation: ‘कृष्ण की चेतावनी’ रामधारी सिंह दिनकर की कविता है।

questions.explanation: ‘पद्मावत’ मलिक मोहम्मद जायसी की प्रसिद्ध रचना है।

questions.question: What is the perimeter of a square with side 5 cm? / 5 सेमी भुजा वाले वर्ग की परिमाप क्या है?
questions.explanation: Perimeter = 4 × side = 4 × 5 = 20 cm.

questions.question: What is the LCM of 12 and 18? / 12 और 18 का लघुत्तम समापवर्त्य (LCM) क्या है?
questions.explanation: LCM of 12 and 18 is 36 as it's the smallest number divisible by both.

questions.question: What is the square root of 144? / 144 का वर्गमूल क्या है?
questions.explanation: Square root of 144 is 12.

questions.question: Simplify: 25 × 4 ÷ 5 / सरल करें: 25 × 4 ÷ 5
What is 15% of 200? / 200 का 15% कितना है?
What is the perimeter of a square with side 5 cm? / 5 सेमी भुजा वाले वर्ग की परिमाप क्या है?
questions.explanation: Perimeter = 4 × side = 4 × 5 = 20 cm.

questions.question: Find the value of 7² + 5² / 7² + 5² का मान ज्ञात करें
What is the cube of 3? / 3 का घन क्या है?
Convert 0.75 to a fraction / 0.75 को भिन्न में बदलें
What is the area of a triangle with base 10 cm and height 8 cm? / 10 सेमी आधार और 8 सेमी ऊँचाई वाले त्रिभुज का क्षेत्रफल क्या है?
questions.explanation: Area = ½ × base × height = ½ × 10 × 8 = 40 cm².

questions.question: What is the average of 10, 20, 30? / 10, 20, 30 का औसत क्या है?
What is ¾ of 200? / 200 का ¾ कितना है?
Simplify: 2³ × 2² / सरल करें: 2³ × 2²
questions.explanation: Add powers: 2³ × 2² = 2⁵ = 32.

questions.question: What is the HCF of 16 and 24? / 16 और 24 का महत्तम समापवर्तक (HCF) क्या है?
questions.explanation: The largest number dividing both 16 and 24 is 8.

questions.question: If a = 5, find a² – 3a / यदि a = 5, तो a² – 3a ज्ञात करें
Find the missing term: 2, 4, 8, 16, ? / रिक्त स्थान भरें: 2, 4, 8, 16, ?
questions.explanation: Each term is multiplied by 2; next = 16 × 2 = 32.

questions.question: What is the value of π (approx.)? / π का मान (लगभग) क्या है?
questions.explanation: Approximate value of π is 3.14.

questions.question: If perimeter of a rectangle is 40 cm and length is 12 cm, find its breadth. / यदि एक आयत की परिमाप 40 सेमी और लंबाई 12 सेमी है, तो चौड़ाई ज्ञात करें।
What is the smallest prime number? / सबसे छोटा अभाज्य संख्या कौन सी है?
questions.explanation: 2 is the smallest and the only even prime number.

questions.question: What is the place value of 7 in 572? / 572 में 7 का स्थानमान क्या है?
questions.explanation: In 572, 7 is in tens place; place value = 70.

questions.question: Convert 3/5 to decimal / 3/5 को दशमलव में बदलें
How many sides does a hexagon have? / षट्भुज के कितने भुजाएँ होती हैं?
questions.explanation: Hexagon has 6 sides.

questions.question: Find the median of 5, 7, 9 / 5, 7, 9 का माध्यिका ज्ञात करें
questions.explanation: The middle value is 7.

questions.question: What is 2/3 of 90? / 90 का 2/3 कितना है?
What is the sum of angles in a triangle? / त्रिभुज के कोणों का योगफल कितना होता है?
questions.explanation: Sum of interior angles in a triangle = 180°.

questions.question: If 1 kg of rice costs ₹50, what will 3.5 kg cost? / यदि 1 किलोग्राम चावल की कीमत ₹50 है, तो 3.5 किग्रा की कीमत क्या होगी?
Which is greater: 3/4 or 4/5? / कौन बड़ा है: 3/4 या 4/5?
questions.explanation: 3/4 = 0.75; 4/5 = 0.8; hence 4/5 is greater.

questions.question: Find the next term: 5, 10, 20, 40, ? / अगला पद ज्ञात करें: 5, 10, 20, 40, ?
questions.explanation: Each term is multiplied by 2; next = 40 × 2 = 80.

questions.question: What is the value of 5! (factorial)? / 5! (फैक्टोरियल) का मान क्या है?
Which is the largest planet in our solar system? / हमारे सौरमंडल का सबसे बड़ा ग्रह कौन सा है?
questions.explanation: Jupiter is the largest planet in our solar system.

questions.question: What is the national animal of India? / भारत का राष्ट्रीय पशु कौन सा है?
questions.explanation: The Bengal Tiger is the national animal of India.

questions.question: How many states are there in India? / भारत में कुल कितने राज्य हैं?
questions.explanation: As of 2025, India has 28 states.

questions.question: Which gas do plants release during photosynthesis? / प्रकाश संश्लेषण के दौरान पौधे कौन सी गैस छोड़ते हैं?
questions.explanation: Plants release oxygen during photosynthesis.

questions.question: Which part of the plant is responsible for photosynthesis? / पौधे का कौन सा भाग प्रकाश संश्लेषण के लिए जिम्मेदार है?
questions.explanation: Leaves contain chlorophyll which is used in photosynthesis.

questions.question: Which is the longest river in India? / भारत की सबसे लंबी नदी कौन सी है?
questions.explanation: The Ganga is the longest river in India.

questions.question: What is the boiling point of water? / पानी का उबलने का बिंदु क्या है?
questions.explanation: Water boils at 100°C at sea level.

questions.question: Which animal is known as the 'Ship of the Desert'? / किस जानवर को 'रेगिस्तान का जहाज' कहा जाता है?
questions.explanation: Camel is adapted to desert conditions, hence called the ship of the desert.

questions.question: Which vitamin is produced in the human body when exposed to sunlight? / सूर्य के प्रकाश में आने पर मानव शरीर में कौन सा विटामिन बनता है?
questions.explanation: Vitamin D is synthesized in the skin when exposed to sunlight.

questions.question: Which festival is known as the Festival of Lights? / किस त्योहार को 'रोशनी का त्योहार' कहा जाता है?
questions.explanation: Diwali is celebrated as the Festival of Lights in India.

questions.question: Which is the smallest continent? / सबसे छोटा महाद्वीप कौन सा है?
questions.explanation: Australia is the smallest continent by land area.

questions.question: What is the main source of energy for Earth? / पृथ्वी के लिए ऊर्जा का मुख्य स्रोत क्या है?
questions.explanation: The Sun is the primary source of energy for all life on Earth.

questions.question: Which organ in humans purifies blood? / मनुष्यों में कौन सा अंग रक्त को शुद्ध करता है?
questions.explanation: Kidneys filter waste from the blood and produce urine.

questions.question: Which layer of the atmosphere contains the ozone layer? / वायुमंडल की किस परत में ओजोन परत होती है?
questions.explanation: The ozone layer is found in the stratosphere.

questions.question: Which is the largest ocean in the world? / दुनिया का सबसे बड़ा महासागर कौन सा है?
questions.explanation: The Pacific Ocean is the largest and deepest ocean.

questions.question: What is the national bird of India? / भारत का राष्ट्रीय पक्षी कौन सा है?
questions.explanation: The peacock is India's national bird.

questions.question: Which is the fastest land animal? / सबसे तेज़ भूमि जानवर कौन सा है?
questions.explanation: Cheetah can run up to 100-120 km/h.

questions.question: What is the largest source of freshwater on Earth? / पृथ्वी पर मीठे पानी का सबसे बड़ा स्रोत क्या है?
questions.explanation: Most of the Earth's freshwater is stored in glaciers.

questions.question: Which device is used to measure temperature? / तापमान मापने के लिए किस उपकरण का उपयोग किया जाता है?
questions.explanation: A thermometer measures temperature.

questions.question: Which natural disaster is measured using the Richter scale? / किस प्राकृतिक आपदा को रिक्टर पैमाने से मापा जाता है?
questions.explanation: The Richter scale measures earthquake magnitude.

questions.question: Which is the largest desert in the world? / दुनिया का सबसे बड़ा रेगिस्तान कौन सा है?
questions.explanation: The Sahara Desert in Africa is the largest hot desert.

questions.question: What is the main gas found in the air we breathe? / हम जो हवा सांस लेते हैं उसमें मुख्य गैस कौन सी है?
questions.explanation: Nitrogen makes up about 78% of Earth's atmosphere.

questions.question: Which is the national flower of India? / भारत का राष्ट्रीय फूल कौन सा है?
questions.explanation: The lotus is the national flower of India.

questions.question: Which process converts water into vapor? / कौन सी प्रक्रिया पानी को वाष्प में बदलती है?
questions.explanation: Evaporation changes liquid water into vapor.

questions.question: Which energy source is renewable? / कौन सा ऊर्जा स्रोत नवीकरणीय है?
questions.explanation: Solar energy is renewable and sustainable.

questions.question: Which planet is known as the Red Planet? / किस ग्रह को लाल ग्रह कहा जाता है?
questions.explanation: Mars appears red due to iron oxide on its surface.

questions.question: What is the study of weather called? / मौसम के अध्ययन को क्या कहा जाता है?
questions.explanation: Meteorology is the study of weather and atmosphere.

questions.question: Which animal lays eggs? / कौन सा जानवर अंडे देता है?
questions.explanation: Hens are birds and they lay eggs.

questions.question: Which festival marks the harvest season in Punjab? / पंजाब में फसल कटाई का त्योहार कौन सा है?
questions.explanation: Baisakhi marks the harvest season in Punjab.

questions.question: Which is the coldest place on Earth? / पृथ्वी का सबसे ठंडा स्थान कौन सा है?
questions.explanation: Antarctica records the lowest natural temperatures on Earth.
